Actions.Name: Crush
Actions.Effects: Becomes a critical hit on hit against winded foes.

Actions.Name: Wail of Terror
Actions.Description: The Fused releases a horrible shriek, a close blast 1 area effect. Characters in the area must save or become winded.
Actions.Effects: Any non-relict character in the area takes [fray] damage three times at the end of their turn, then this effect ends. They can ignore this effect by ending their turn adjacent to an ally. This action instantly recharges if the Fused misses with an attack or does not attack on their turn.
